=encoding utf8

=head1 NAME

Dist::Zilla::Plugin::TestML1Includer - Ship your TestML1 version

=for html
<a href="https://travis-ci.org/ingydotnet/dist-zilla-plugin-testml1includer-pm"><img src="https://travis-ci.org/ingydotnet/dist-zilla-plugin-testml1includer-pm.png" alt="dist-zilla-plugin-testml1includer-pm"></a>
<a href="https://coveralls.io/r/ingydotnet/dist-zilla-plugin-testml1includer-pm?branch=master"><img src="https://coveralls.io/repos/ingydotnet/dist-zilla-plugin-testml1includer-pm/badge.png" alt="dist-zilla-plugin-testml1includer-pm"></a>

=head1 SYNOPSIS

In dist.ini:

    [TestML1Includer]

=head1 DESCRIPTION

This module includes the version of TestML1 on your system with your
module dist.

TestML1.pm is the old version of L<TestML> from 2014-2018. To continue using
that just change C<TestML> to C<TestML1>.
